channel.title: Top of server screen
channel.description:
How do I make the top of my screen say like:
Welcome To PaperScape(players name here)! (players online) Owner:Paper Scape
Stuff like that... please post! :] [br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 06:18:05 PM[/size][hr]omg...

item.title: Top of server screen
item.dc:creator: @Pizz4_0wnz Pizz4 0wnz

omg quit spamming lmao mod lock this pl0x

Read full topic

item.title: Top of server screen
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:12, topic:149685”][quote author=lawl link=topic=205073.msg1807044#msg1807044 date=1191738759]

Corn, that’s for an interface that pops up when u log in im guessing. Pizza try this:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @whi@~@red@Name of server@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Owner=@whi@ur own acc name", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Also u will need writePlayers(); under boolean process. Hippyss will work 2 but this is already worked out for u expect for filling in ur name and the server name.

U can just mess around with the colors and stuff, but thats for ur server name, owner’s name, and players online. Hope it helped.

I like this one :] thanks it pwns lol

you’re welcome

Ur welcome? Lol whyd u say ur welcome? I posted that =P

yes, but i made it a year ago
[/quote]OHH SHIT!!! CAUGHT HIM!!! OMFG LMAOO!!! NICE LOl!![/quote]

ROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAOOOOOOOOO!!!

Funneh.

Read full topic

item.title: Top of server screen
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

add this void wherever you want in client.java

public void ShowScreenText() { sendFrame126(" ServerName", 13589); sendFrame126("", 13590); sendFrame126("", 13591); sendFrame126("", 13592); sendFrame126("", 13593); sendFrame126("", 13594); sendFrame126("", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13595); sendFrame126("", 13596); sendFrame126("", 13597); sendFrame126("", 13598); sendFrame126("", 13599); sendFrame126("", 13600); setInterfaceWalkable(13588); } then add ShowScreenText(); under public boolean process

Read full topic

item.title: Top of server screen
item.dc:creator: @C0rn_L33 C0rn L33
item.description:
@C0rn_L33 wrote:

sendQuest("@red@Welcome toPaperScape", 8145); sendQuest("@whi@Owner-Paper", 8147); sendQuest("@whi@ For a list of commands type ::commands.", 8148); sendQuest("@whi@Players online:@red@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8149); sendQuest("@whi@~~Your current Pk stats~~", 8150); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152); sendQuest("@whi@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153); sendQuest("@whi@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154); sendQuest("@whi@::buymod if you want to buy mod/admin.", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("@red@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~", 8157);

There ya go If it helped tell me.

Read full topic
